tekSoftwareLibrary.name: Spring Cloud Gateway
tekSoftwareLibrary.tags: spring, cloud, gateway, microservices, routing, load-balancing, security, resilience, observability, api-gateway
tekSoftwareLibrary.description: Spring Cloud Gateway is a library for routing to APIs and providing cross-cutting concerns to them such as: security, monitoring/metrics, and resiliency. It allows you to define routes that are matched against the HTTP request. The route is defined by a URI, predicates, and filters which are applied to requests.
